mapper.sql: id, name, style, color, price, type, remark, preview_img, full_img, obj_model, mtl_model, sale_time, buy_time, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from jk_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into jk_info (id, name, style, color, price, type, remark, preview_img, full_img, obj_model, mtl_model, sale_time, buy_time, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtlModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), now())

id,
name,

color,

full_img,
obj_model,
mtl_model,

mapper.update:
update jk_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
preview_img = #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
full_img = #{fullImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obj_model = #{objModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mtl_model = #{mtlModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_time = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update jk_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preview_img = #{previewImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, full_img = #{fullImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obj_model = #{objModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mtl_model = #{mtlModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_time = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
